author: jgomes
msg: Refactored the NAnt scripts to link in the correct framework assemblies for the given target framework.  Several code changes were necessary now that the .NET Compact Framework was actually being compiled.  Several code enhancements had been made that were incompatible with .NET CF 2.0.

author: bentmann
msg: [MPLUGIN-100] Allow customization of file encoding used for generated help goal
o Used encoding from request for output file

author: bentmann
msg: o Adjusted encoding default value to follow our proposal
